Text:
Thanks for sharing this torrent. It is on filesharing sites too, but it is good to have a torrent going in case the other download links dy out.
Amazing collection, and the biggest cd undertaking so far, even eclipsing the 180 cds of the Philips Mozart collection!

Thanks a lot for this great collection, btw Vol.05 1970-1972 (CD 97) is corrupt
Thanx

This CD Box changed my life. I'll be forever grateful.

@zeke90: CD 97 not corrupt. it's just a very short CD as confirmed by the booklet. There are some errors in the CUE file which caused problems when I tried to split the flac, but they are easily repaired by replacing some double quotes (") by single quoties ('). After that the splitting worked out perfectly.
@shadow57254 Thanks for Your info about CD 97 I have just split the flac according to Your instructions and i works great THANKS
